channel.title: Adding Portals/Any Ground Object need help!
channel.description: Ok, I go to client.java when I search make global object nothing comes up 0-o, how am I going to make objects spawn?

item.title: Adding Portals/Any Ground Object need help!
item.dc:creator: @jr_pwn jr pwn
item.description:
@jr_pwn wrote:

search for

public void NewObjects()

add this

AddGlobalObject(x-coord, y-coord, item-ID, -direction, 10); //this is where you add what the name of the object is and where it's at.

direction:(Dir, 0=West -1=North -2=East -3=South)

if that didnt solve you question send me your question in a message on this fourm.

this is an example

AddGlobalObject(2545, 4711, 532, 0, 10); //staglagmite && mb

did that help?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Portals/Any Ground Object need help!
